properties.name: Hanauma Bay!
properties.description: Posted by BgauseWooohoooo! Wonderful snorkling. Deb actually tried it but decided to flee the water when a huge(3 in) fish attacked us. She had a great time anyway and got back in the water.

properties.name: Hilton Hawaiian Village - WOOT!
properties.description: Posted by BgauseWonderful place! Everything you need is there.

properties.name: Jamacan Beach hut
properties.description: Posted by Bgause  Best place we went on this speck of Mexico.... Ice cold Dos XX and hammocs on the beach.... almost made up for the f0$%0 tourist robbing cop.

properties.name: Liberty Steakhouse and Brewery
properties.description: Posted by BgauseGreat happy hour year round. In the summer its hard to beat for sitting around and having a few beers after work. And they are bird friendly, Coconut loves their Nut Brown Ale.

properties.name: MYR
properties.description: Posted by BgauseDon\'t land unless you are rich. These guys will charge you for breathing.....

properties.name: Myabi's Japanese Steakhouse & Sushi
properties.description: Posted by BgauseBest Sushi on the beach. Take, Tony, Kenny are the best.
